keyword: calories in chicken nuggets chick fil a
title: Calories in Chick-fil-A Chicken Nuggets
meta_description: Learn calories in chicken nuggets Chick-fil-A for an 8-piece serving: 250 kcal with 28g protein, plus full nutrition facts, tweaks, and FAQs.
assumptions: Standard 8-piece serving of breaded, fried chicken breast nuggets from Chick-fil-A; no sauce or sides included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and customizations; values based on official Chick-fil-A data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: An 8-piece serving of Chick-fil-A chicken nuggets provides 250 kcal and 28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add one packet of Chick-fil-A sauce

faqs.q: How many calories in Chick-fil-A 8-piece chicken nuggets?

faqs.a: 13 g total carbs per 8-piece, with 1 g fiber and 0 g sugars.
